com.uber.autodispose

Class TestLifecycleScopeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uber.autodispose.TestLifecycleScopeProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleScopeProvider<TestLifecycleScopeProvider.TestLifecycle>

    public final class TestLifecycleScopeProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifecycleScopeProvider<TestLifecycleScopeProvider.TestLifecycle>
    Test utility to create LifecycleScopeProvider instances for tests. Supports a start and stop lifecycle. Subscribing when outside of the lifecycle will throw either a LifecycleNotStartedException or LifecycleEndedException. }
